body_text: I'm concerned about the order of execution here. What happens when an even gets emitted before the .then() that listens to this receives this emitter? I don't think EventEmitters usually queue messages until a listener is around. I'm not sure how to fix this though, except to not use the Promise, and just return an event emitter directly.
